feed.title: vonMentzer-Group
feed.subtitle: Website of the von Mentzer Group at the University of Gothenburg, led by Dr Astrid von Mentzer.

entry.title: Visiting the Thomson Group and joining the Applied Bioinformatics and Public Health Microbiology Conference

link.title: Visiting the Thomson Group and joining the Applied Bioinformatics and Public Health Microbiology Conference

entry.content: It was a couple of years ago since I attended the Applied Bioinformatics and Public Health Conference organised by Wellcome Connecting Science. Excited to get updated on the latest bioinformatic tools used in microbial genomics. Some of the talks I am looking forward to a little bit extra is “Mutational spectra are associated with pathogen niche” by Chris Ruis,
entry.summary: It was a couple of years ago since I attended the Applied Bioinformatics and Public Health Conference organised by Wellcome Connecting Science. Excited to get updated on the latest bioinformatic tools used in microbial genomics. Some of the talks I am looking forward to a little bit extra is “Mutational spectra are associated with pathogen niche” by Chris Ruis,
